original_text: Then released he Barabbas unto them: and when he had scourged Jesus, he delivered him to be crucified.
korean_text: 이에 바라바는 그들에게 놓아 주고 예수는 채찍질하고 십자가에 못 박히게 넘겨 주니라

sentences.original_text: Then released he Barabbas unto them:
and when he had scourged Jesus,
he delivered him to be crucified.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그를 십자가에 못 박히도록 넘겨주었다.
